messages.content:
Answer the given question. You must conduct reasoning inside <think> and </think> first every time you get new information. After reasoning, if you find you lack some knowledge, you can call a search engine by <search> query </search> and it will return the top searched results between <information> and </information>. You can search as many times as your want. If you find no further external knowledge needed, you can directly provide the answer inside <answer> and </answer>, without detailed illustrations. For example, <answer> Beijing </answer>. Question: Please list the top 10 individuals from the Forbes Global Billionaires Ranking for each year from 2019 to 2024 (including 2024). For each person, include their name, ranking, net worth, source of wealth, and age of that year end. Present the information in a table format. All your data should come from Forbes, which means the ages and net worth are calculated based on the publication date.

Please present the organized data in one Markdown table format.
The column headers, in order, should be:
Year, Rank, Name, Net Worth (in USD billions), Age, Source of Wealth.

Don't ask me any questions, just output the results according to the columns without omitting cells arbitrarily. The output format is ```markdown
{data_content}
```.?

<think>
To start, I need to gather the top 10 individuals from the Forbes Global Billionaires Ranking for each year from 2019 to 2024. This requires multiple queries for each year. Let's begin with the first year, 2019.
</think>

<search> Forbes Global Billionaires Ranking 2019 </search>

Search query: Forbes Global Billionaires Ranking 2019
Result: [Doc 1](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_World%27s_Billionaires):
The World's Billionaires - Wikipedia Bill Gates was named the richest man in the world by Forbes' annual list of the world's billionaires. This was the 16th time that the founder of Microsoft ...

[Doc 2](https://stats.areppim.com/listes/list_billionairesx19xwor.htm):
World Top 500 Billionaires 2019 - areppim 1, Jeff Bezos, 135 ; 2, Bill Gates, 97.7 ; 3, Warren Buffett, 82 ; 4, Bernard Arnault, 81.8 ...

[Doc 3](https://www.forbes.com/real-time-billionaires/):
Forbes Real Time Billionaires List - The World's Richest People The Real-Time Billionaires List ; Elon Musk. 1. Elon Musk ; Larry Page. 2. Larry Page ; Jeff Bezos. 3. Jeff Bezos ; Sergey Brin. 4. Sergey Brin.

From these sources, I see that the data needs specific formatting and checking per year. Let's proceed with 2019 first.

<search> Top 10 Forbes Global Billionaires Ranking 2019 </search>

Search query: Top 10 Forbes Global Billionaires Ranking 2019
Result: [Doc 1](https://www.forbes.com/real-time-billionaires/):
Forbes Real Time Billionaires List - The World's Richest People Bernard Arnault & family. 7. Bernard Arnault & family ; Jensen Huang. 8. Jensen Huang ; Warren Buffett. 9. Warren Buffett ; Steve Ballmer. 10. Steve Ballmer.

[Doc 2](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_World%27s_Billionaires):
The World's Billionaires - Wikipedia Jeff Bezos of Amazon, Mark Zuckerberg of Facebook and Michael Bloomberg of Bloomberg L.P., appeared for the first time on the Forbes top 10 billionaires list, ...

[Doc 3](https://stats.areppim.com/listes/list_billionairesx19xwor.htm):
World Top 500 Billionaires 2019 - areppim 2, Bill Gates, 97.7 ; 3, Warren Buffett, 82 ; 4, Bernard Arnault, 81.8 ; 5, Amancio Ortega, 67.2 ...

I need more direct ranking data for 2019. Let's try:

<search> Top 10 Forbes Global Billionaires Ranking 2019 detailed </search>

Search query: Top 10 Forbes Global Billionaires Ranking 2019 detailed
Result: [Doc 1](https://www.forbes.com/real-time-billionaires/):
Forbes Real Time Billionaires List - The World's Richest People The Real-Time Billionaires List ; Warren Buffett. 9. Warren Buffett ; Steve Ballmer. 10. Steve Ballmer ; Amancio Ortega. 11. Amancio Ortega.

[Doc 2](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_World%27s_Billionaires):
The World's Billionaires - Wikipedia Jeff Bezos of Amazon, Mark Zuckerberg of Facebook and Michael Bloomberg of Bloomberg L.P., appeared for the first time on the Forbes top 10 billionaires list, ...

[Doc 3](https://stats.areppim.com/listes/list_billionairesx19xwor.htm):
World Top 500 Billionaires 2019 - areppim 9, Carlos Slim, 54.7 ; 10, Sergey Brin, 54.4 ; 11, Francoise Bettencourt Meyers, 50.8 ; 12, Mukesh Ambani, 50 ...

Now I have enough detail to form the table.

Let's move onto 2020.
<search> Top 10 Forbes Global Billionaires Ranking 2020 </search>

Search query: Top 10 Forbes Global Billionaires Ranking 2020
Result: [Doc 1](https://www.forbes.com/real-time-billionaires/):
Forbes Real Time Billionaires List - The World's Richest People Bernard Arnault & family. 7. Bernard Arnault & family ; Jensen Huang. 8. Jensen Huang ; Warren Buffett. 9. Warren Buffett ; Steve Ballmer. 10. Steve Ballmer.

[Doc 2](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_World%27s_Billionaires):
The World's Billionaires - Wikipedia Jeff Bezos of Amazon, Mark Zuckerberg of Facebook and Michael Bloomberg of Bloomberg L.P., appeared for the first time on the Forbes top 10 billionaires list, ...

[Doc 3](https://www.forbes.com/billionaires/):
2025 Billionaires List: Richest People Ranked The Richest People In The World ; 1, Elon Musk. $342 B ; 2, Mark Zuckerberg. $216 B ; 3, Jeff Bezos. $215 B ; 4, Larry Ellison. $192 B.

This indicates yearly changes need verification.

Proceeding with 2020, let's check rankings.
<search> Top 10 Forbes Global Billionaires Ranking 2020 detailed </search>

Search query: Top 10 Forbes Global Billionaires Ranking 2020 detailed
Result: [Doc 1](https://www.forbes.com/real-time-billionaires/):
Forbes Real Time Billionaires List - The World's Richest People The Real-Time Billionaires List ; Warren Buffett. 9. Warren Buffett ; Steve Ballmer. 10. Steve Ballmer ; Amancio Ortega. 11. Amancio Ortega.

[Doc 2](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_World%27s_Billionaires):
The World's Billionaires - Wikipedia 2020. In the 34th annual Forbes list of the world's billionaires, the list included 2,095 billionaires with a total net wealth of $8 trillion, down 58 members ...

[Doc 3](https://www.forbes.com/billionaires/):
Forbes 2025 Billionaires List - The Richest People In The World ... The Richest People In The World ; 2, Mark Zuckerberg. $216 B ; 3, Jeff Bezos. $215 B ; 4, Larry Ellison. $192 B ; 5, Bernard Arnault & family. $178 B.

Let's use Forbes direct ranking now.
<search> Top 10 Forbes Global Billionaires Ranking 2020 </search>

Search query: Top 10 Forbes Global Billionaires Ranking 2020
Result: [Doc 1](https://www.forbes.com/real-time-billionaires/):
Forbes Real Time Billionaires List - The World's Richest People The Real-Time Billionaires List ; Warren Buffett. 9. Warren Buffett ; Steve Ballmer. 10. Steve Ballmer ; Amancio Ortega. 11. Amancio Ortega.

[Doc 2](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_World%27s_Billionaires):
The World's Billionaires - Wikipedia Jeff Bezos of Amazon, Mark Zuckerberg of Facebook and Michael Bloomberg of Bloomberg L.P., appeared for the first time on the Forbes top 10 billionaires list, ...

[Doc 3](https://www.forbes.com/billionaires/):
